name: Five Nights at Phantom's Remake
description:
Five Nights at Phantom's Remake

Story - You were hired as a mechanic in a small restaurant to fix the animatronics. You also decide to work as a night security guard there, but something went wrong...

How to play:

  • To use a flashlight press Ctrl;
  • close the doors if someone is there;
  • Press "A" or "D" to close the doors
  • Press "Q" to turn on the left light
